name: #B104 Boston Private Two twin BR Central AC
neighborhood_overview:
In front of our building is a beautiful park and a church.
Building left is city of Boston owned property , and our right is a home owner occupied red building good neighborhood .

Very convenient location easy to go to Boston. 2 miles to Bay Center Shopping areas; 2 miles to U-Mass Boston ; 3 miles to BU; 3 miles to Northeastern University.

no smoking allowed in side or outside. It is smoking free building and 24/7 video systems in our building.
description:
Recently renovated private room two twin beds in a 4 bedroom with keyless front door entry.

2 new bathrooms and modern kitchen.

Close to downtown: 10 min driving or busses #15 & # 17 right outside house to connect you to Redline train .

The space
Location: Bowdoin St off Quincy St Dorchester MA 02122. Near UMass Boston , downtown and Convention Center. All in less 3 miles .

How can you get here?

From Logan Airport take Silver Line get off at South Station change to Red Line ; then get off at Fields Corner ; walk over 0.8 mails or take the #15 or #17 and get off at Bowdoin St stop .

Brand new renovated all the blankets are new , kitchenware are ready , refrigerator always has refreshments for you free!

Guest access
Keyless entry. Come and go as you please!
Brand new kitchen; refrigerator and pantry constantly stocked for you (coffee, tea, bottled water, juice, soda, eggs, bagel
